abstract: Defense Department confirms deaths of two American service members in Afghanistan and in operations against Islamic State militants.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 2,343 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and three service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.

headline.main: Military Deaths in Afghan and ISIS Operations
headline.seo: Military Deaths in Afghan and ISIS Operations

snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 2,343 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and three service members who have died supporting the operation to eliminate the Islamic State militant group.
